info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:44PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fremont, southwestern El Paso and northwestern Pueblo Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 343 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pinon, or 16 miles north of Pueblo. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pinon and Pueblo West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
